comments.title: Must have
comments.description: How I wish it had sleeves. But sleeveless is still pretty. Pure cotton, bright indigo colours with a beautiful print. The fabric could have been little more bring in colours, may be it’s a old stock. But the fitting is perfect. I’m sure, the colours won’t bleed too as it’s a reputation brand biba. The embroidery is like a necklace which can be put separately over the dress. One can wear it without it too. I love the way it’s built, layers of fabric stitched together to give a it a loose airy fit from bottom. The under fabric is soft cotton. I’m totally in love with it!

comments.title: As expected from Biba.
comments.description: People buying from Biba do not need any comment on the quality of their products. This suit also is extremely comfortable, made of pure cotton, very soft and feels amazing on skin. It's a unique shade of blue and got a dull finish but you know what you're buying and it suits my taste completely. The dupatta is also quite long. I'm 5'5 and it reaches my ankel both front and back when I take it on one shoulder. People wearing M/L can go for 38 easily.
